Paper.Title: Importance of Pronominal Anaphora resolution in Question Answering systems

Section.Paragraph: The main aim of this paper is to analyse the e#0Bects of applying pronominal anaphora resolution to Question Answering #28QA#29 systems.
For this task a complete QA system has been implemented. System evaluation measures performance improvements obtained when information that is referenced anaphorically in documents is not ignored.
